title: The Ecclesiastical History, Dialogues, and Letters of Theodoret

paragraphs.text: The Ecclesiastical History, Dialogues, and Letters of Theodoret
THE ECCLESIASTICAL HISTORY, DIALOGUES, AND LETTERS OF THEODORET

Vicar of St. Bartholomew's, Moor Lane, and Fellow of King's College, London.
